answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!Please get her thyroid functions tested and also test for diabetes. Both cause a person to feel more cold than usual.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage.  Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: My younger sister plays netball frequently.Recently she kept complaining that when she is playing netball in the hot sun, she feels cold. She said that she felt so cold that she had to put on the jacket right after the game ended. She said that she have not felt cold halfway in a game before in her 4 years of netball. However, all the recent games that she played, she feels cold.Is there anything wrong with her?
title: Feeling Cold under Hot Sun
